  1. Oxford 3000
  2. Oxford 13

Words 1201-1300

  1. gun
    He saw a man holding a gun in the movie.

  2. guy
    The guy at the store helped me find what I needed.

  3. gym
    She goes to the gym every morning to exercise.

  4. habit
    Reading before bed is a good habit.

  5. hair
    Her hair is long and shiny.

  6. half
    I ate half of the pizza for lunch.

  7. hall
    The students waited in the hall before class.

  8. hand
    He raised his hand to ask a question.

  9. handle
    Can you handle this box? It’s quite heavy.

  10. hang
    Please hang your coat on the hook.

  11. happen
    What will happen if it rains tomorrow?

  12. happily
    They lived happily ever after.

  13. happiness
    Her smile showed her happiness.

  14. happy
    I am happy to see you again.

  15. hard
    This problem is very hard to solve.

  16. hardly
    I can hardly hear what you are saying.

  17. harm
    Smoking can cause harm to your health.

  18. harmful
    Some chemicals are harmful to the environment.

  19. hat
    He wore a hat to protect himself from the sun.

  20. hate
    I hate waiting in long lines.

  21. have
    Do you have a pen I can borrow?

  22. he
    He is my best friend.

  23. head
    She nodded her head in agreement.

  24. headache
    I have a headache after working all day.

  25. headline
    The headline of the article caught my attention.

  26. health
    Eating vegetables is good for your health.

  27. healthy
    She tries to eat healthy food every day.

  28. hear
    Can you hear the music from the next room?

  29. hearing
    His hearing is very sharp.

  30. heart
    My heart beats faster when I run.

  31. heat
    The heat from the sun was very strong.

  32. heating
    The heating in the house keeps us warm in winter.

  33. heaven
    The view from the mountain felt like heaven.

  34. heavily
    It rained heavily all night.

  35. heavy
    This bag is too heavy for me to carry.

  36. heel
    She hurt her heel while running.

  37. height
    The height of the building is impressive.

  38. helicopter
    The helicopter landed in the open field.

  39. hell
    The war turned their lives into hell.

  40. hello
    She said hello to everyone in the room.

  41. help
    Can you help me with this project?

  42. helpful
    The instructions were very helpful.

  43. her
    I gave her the book she wanted.

  44. here
    Please sit here and wait for a moment.

  45. hero
    He became a hero after saving the child.

  46. hers
    This bag is hers, not mine.

  47. herself
    She made the dress herself.

  48. hesitate
    Don’t hesitate to ask if you need help.

  49. hey
    Hey, are you coming to the party?

  50. hi
    Hi, how are you today?

  51. hide
    The cat tried to hide under the table.

  52. high
    The mountain is very high and hard to climb.

  53. highlight
    The teacher asked us to highlight the important points.

  54. highly
    She is highly skilled in her job.

  55. hill
    We climbed the hill to see the sunset.

  56. him
    I saw him at the park yesterday.

  57. himself
    He built the house himself.

  58. hire
    They plan to hire more workers next month.

  59. his
    This is his car, not mine.

  60. historic
    The city is known for its historic buildings.

  61. historical
    We visited a historical museum last weekend.

  62. history
    She loves reading books about history.

  63. hit
    The ball hit the wall and bounced back.

  64. hobby
    Painting is my favorite hobby.

  65. hockey
    He plays hockey with his friends every weekend.

  66. hold
    Please hold the door open for me.

  67. hole
    There is a hole in my sock.

  68. holiday
    We are planning a holiday at the beach.

  69. hollow
    The tree trunk was hollow inside.

  70. holy
    The church is a holy place for many people.

  71. home
    I feel happy when I am at home.

  72. homework
    I need to finish my homework before dinner.

  73. honest
    She is always honest with her friends.

  74. honour
    It is an honour to meet you.

  75. hope
    I hope you have a great day.

  76. horrible
    The food tasted horrible, so I didn’t eat it.

  77. horror
    The horror movie was too scary for me.

  78. horse
    She loves riding her horse in the countryside.

  79. hospital
    He went to the hospital for a check-up.

  80. host
    The host welcomed everyone to the party.

  81. hot
    The soup is too hot to eat right now.

  82. hotel
    We stayed at a nice hotel during our trip.

  83. hour
    It takes an hour to drive to the city.

  84. house
    Their house is big and has a beautiful garden.

  85. household
    Every household has its own rules.

  86. housing
    The city is building more housing for families.

  87. how
    How do you solve this problem?

  88. however
    I wanted to go out; however, it started raining.

  89. huge
    The elephant is a huge animal.

  90. human
    Every human has the right to live freely.

  91. humorous
    His humorous stories always make us laugh.

  92. humour
    She has a great sense of humour.

  93. hundred
    There are a hundred students in the school.

  94. hungry
    I am so hungry that I could eat a whole pizza.

  95. hunt
    They went to the forest to hunt for deer.

  96. hunting
    Hunting is not allowed in this area.

  97. hurricane
    The hurricane caused a lot of damage to the town.

  98. hurry
    We need to hurry or we will miss the bus.

  99. hurt
    He hurt his leg while playing football.

  100. husband
    Her husband is a kind and caring person.
